string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item:
Welcome to Tomdroid
!\n

You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.
\n
=Online Synchronization=

Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.
\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:

-
Tomboy Online
- https://edge.tomboy-online.org/

-
Rainy Sync Server
- https://www.notesync.org/\n

Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.
\n

Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.
\n

Please see
http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories
for the location of the
*.note
files on all platforms.
\n
=SD Card=

Put your Tomboy notes
(*.note)
on your SD Card under
tomdroid/
. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.
\n

Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad:
http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev
.
\n

Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online

* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!

Welcome to Tomdroid.


 Please note that this is beta quality software and that it contains known problems.


 We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.


 If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.item: Tervetuloa Tomdroidiin!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online-synkronointi=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD-kortti=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Tomdroid へようこそ！\n
まだメモはありません。始めるには、設定項目の同期設定を行なってください。以下で説明する2つの同期オプションがあります。\n
=オンライン同期=
Tomboy-Online やご自身の Reiny/Snowy サーバー、もしくは Tomboy Web REST API に対応したあらゆるサーバーと動機したい場合、オンライン同期を利用できます。\n
これを利用するには、設定項目の同期サービスをオンライン同期にし、サーバーのURLを指定します。以下に一般的なものをいくつか示します:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
設定したら、Tomboy 上部のバーの同期ロゴをタッチしてメモを同期します。\n
メモ: このアプリは開発途上のため、Tomboy メモを破壊する可能性があります。同期前に Tomboy メモをバックアップしておくと良いでしょう。\n
http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories を参照し、全てのプラットフォームにおける *.note ファイルの場所を調べて下さい。\n
=SDカード=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
最後に、何らかの問題に遭遇した場合は、以下に報告をお願いします: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Välkommen till Tomdroid!\n
Du har inga anteckningar här ännu. För att komma igång måste du ange dina synkroniseringsinställningar under Inställningar. Det finns två synkroniseringsalternativ, som beskrivs nedan.\n
=Onlinesynkronisering=
Onlinesynkronisering är till för dig som vill synkronisera med Tomboy-Online, din egen Rainy/Snowy-server eller en annan server som stöder Tomboys API Web REST.\n
För att använda det, ställ in synkroniseringstjänsten till Onlinesynkronisering i inställningarna och ange en serveradress. Här är några av de offentliga servrarna:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[användarnamn]/[lösenord]/\n
När allt är inställt, klicka på synkroniseringsikonen i Tomdroids verktygsfält för att synkronisera dina anteckningar.\n
Obs: vi rekommenderar att du säkerhetskopierar dina Tomboy-anteckningar innan synkronisering, eftersom det här programmet fortfarande är under utveckling och kan skada dina anteckningsfiler.\n
Gå till http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories för platsinformation om *.note-filer på alla plattformar.\n
=SD-kort=

Lägg dina Tomboy-anteckningar (*.note) på ditt SD-kort under "tomdroid/". När anteckningarna har kopierats anger du inställningen Synkroniseringstjänst till "SD-kort" och klickar på synkroniseringsikonen i Tomdroids verktygsfält.\n
Tomdroid söker ständigt efter nya medarbetare. Om du är intresserad kan du ansluta dig till Tomdroids utvecklingsgrupp på Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Sist, men inte minst. Om du stöter på något problem, var vänlig och rapportera det på: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Välkommen till Tomdroid.

Observera att detta är programvara av betakvalitet och att den innehåller kända buggar.

Vi är väl medvetna om dessa problem och avser att åtgärda dem så snabbt vi kan. Men vi ville också ge ut något och få det testat så tidigt som möjligt.

Om du vill bidra, så tar vi emot hjälp på alla nivåer med öppna armar. Titta in på launchpad.net/tomdroid och kontakta oss!

* Anteckningar kan nu skapas, redigeras och tas bort
* Helt ny formgivning för både pekplattor och telefoner
* Synkronisera dina anteckningar med kompatibla webbtjänster eller till ditt SD-kort
* Skicka och ta emot anteckningsfiler eller text från vilken annan app som helst
* Mer anpassningsbar än tidigare
* Nu tillgänglig på ännu fler språk …

 … m.m. För en fullständig lista över ändringar, gå till https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements

En Tomboy-klient för Android. Tomboy är en anteckningsapp av wiki-typ med ett enkelt användargränssnitt.

* Formatkompatibel med Tomboy
* Online-synkronisering av anteckningar mot Rainy, Snowy eller Tomboy Online
* Import från SD-kort
* Snabblänkar på hemskärmen
* Skicka/ta emot text eller anteckningsfiler från valfri app
* Öppen källkod!
Ако е избрано, ще покаже изтрити бележки от листа с бележки.
Избран е невалиден размер шрифт. Моля, изберете номер.
Това ще върне местната бележка към която и да е съществуваща версия на отдалечената услуга. Наистина ли искате да направите това?

Добре дошли в Tomdroid.

Моля, забележете, че този софтуер е с beta качество и съдържа известни проблеми.

Ние сме добре запознати с тези проблеми и се стремим да работим по тях бързо, но също така искахме да покажем нещо работещо, за да бъде тествано възможно по- скоро.

Ако искате да съдействате, помощ от всякакъв вид ще бъде оценена. Хоп, на борда на on launchpad.net/tomdroid и се свържете с нас!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Добре дошли в Tomdroid!\n
Все още нямате бележки. За да започнете, изберете машите предпочитания за Синхронизация от Настройки. Има две опции за синхронизация описани по- долу.\n
=Онлайн синхронизация=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
За да го използвате, изберете "синхронизираща услуга към онлайн синхронизация" от предпочитанията и поставете URL на сървъра. Тези са някои от публичните:
-Tomboy Онлайн - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Веднъж зададено, натиснете логото за синхронизация на горната лента на Tomdroid, за да синхронизирате вашите бележки.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Карта=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
В заключение, ако срещнете някакъв проблем, моля, докладвайте го на: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

file.string: Издърпване на всички бележки от SD картата? Това може да презапише вашите съществуващи бележки.
Бележките са успешно възстановени от SD картата.
Моля, почакайте докато бележката се зареди...
Authorization with %1$s failed. Try again later!
Директорията \"%1$s\" все още не съществува. Моля, свържете вашето устройство към компютъра, създайте директорията и я попълнете с *.note файлове.
Наистина ли искате да изчистите базата данни с бележки?
Изчистване на всички бележки от местната база данни
Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изтриете тази бележка?
Възникна грешка при опита за прочитане на вашата колекция от бележки. Ако можете да откриете проблема, моля, свържете се с нас!
Възникна грешка при прочитане на бележката. Моля, проверете вашият XML.
Премахване на всички търсения, които сте изпълнявали
Наистина ли искате да отхвърлите промените и да върнете бележката към предишната запазена версия?
Адресът на сървъра е променен, но новата стойност е празна
Наистина ли искате да изтриете всички бележки от отдалечената услуга?
Копиране на всички бележки на SD картата? Това може да презапише съществуващите бележки на SD картата.
Link telephone numbers to phone app
Изберете файл, който е файл за бележка на Tomboy (който ще бъде внесен) или обикновен тектови файл (който ще създаде нова бележка):
Please choose an action to resolve the conflict. You may edit either note before choosing, or view the difference by clicking on the labels below.
Бележките са успешно архивирани на SD картата.
Пространството на SD картата не е намерено.
Това ще върне вашите местни бележки към която и да е съществуваща версия на отдалечената услуга. Наистина ли искате да направите това?
вземане на лист с отдалечени бележки...

A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Welcome to Tomdroid.

Please note that this is beta quality software and that it contains known problems.

We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.

If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!

=Online Synchronization=

Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=

Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Bu not zaten veritabanında mevcut. Lütfen çakışmayı çözmek için bir eylem seçin. Notu seçmeden önce düzenleyebilir ve aşağıdaki etiketleri kullanarak farklılıkları görebilirsiniz.
Yerel veri tabanından bütün notları temizle
\"%1$s\" klasörü henüz mevcut değil. Lütfen cihazınızı bilgisayara bağlayın, klasörü oluşturun ve *.note dosyalarıyla doldurun.

İstediğiniz gibi not yaratabilir düzenleyebilir ve silebilirsiniz
* Tablet ve telefonlar için tekrar dizayn edildi
* Notlarınızı online servislerimize veya SD karta senkronize edip saklayabilirsiniz
* Herhangi bir uygulamadan metin veya dosya alabilir ya da uygulamaya gönderebilirsiniz
* Önceki sürümlere göre daha ayarlanabilir 
* Daha fazla dil için uygun

 Daha fazlası için lütfen https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements
SD Card\'dan bütün yerel notları kopyala

Tomboy ile uyumlu çevrimiçi eşitleme özellikli not alma uygulaması

SD Card\'da bulunan bütün notları kopyala? Eğer SD Card\'da aynı isimli bir not varsa üstüne yazar
Bunu yaparsanız uzak cihazdaki not ne olursa olsun yerel notunuz değiştirilecektir. Bunu yine de yapmak istiyor musunuz?
Dosya alma limiti aşan bir dosya talep ediyorsunuz. İçinde sadece metin olduğundan emin misiniz?
Sunucu adresi değişti fakat yeni değer boş
İstenilen not bulunamadı. Eşitleme yoluyla silinmiş veya kaldırılmış olabilir.
Bunu yaparsanız uzak cihazdaki notlar ne olursa olsun yerel notlarınız değiştirilecektir. Bunu yine de yapmak istiyor musunuz?
Aşağıdaki dosyalardan birisini seçin. Bunlar Tomboy not dosyası( dışarıdan alınabilir) ya da sadece metin içeren dosyalar( Yeni Not ile yaratabilirsiniz) olabilir.

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Tomdroid\'e Hoşgeldiniz!\n
Burada henüz bir notunuz yok. Başlamak için, ayarların içinde bulunan eşitleme ayarlarından size uygun olanı seçin. 2 adet senkronizasyon seçeneği mevcuttur.\n
= Çevrimiçi Eşitleme=

Eğer Tomboy-Çevrimiçi\'ye, kendi Rainy/Snowy sunucunuza veya Tomboy Web REST API\'ı destekleyen herhangi bir sunucuya eşitleme yapmak istiyorsanız Çevrimiçi Eşzamanlama, tam olarak aradığınız şeydir.\n
Çevrimiçi Eşitleme seçeneğinden Eşitleme Hizmetini kullanın, ardından da Sunucu URL\'nizi girin. Herkesin kullanabildiği birkaç sunucu:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[kullanıcıadı]/[parola]/\n
Başlamadan önce, Tomdroid üst çubuğunda bulunan Eşitleme simgesine tıklayarak notlarınızı eşitleyebilirsiniz.\n
Not: Bu uygulama hala geliştirme aşamasında olduğundan ve Tomboy notlarınız zarar görebileceğinden, eşitlemeden önce Tomboy notlarınızı yedeklemek isteyebilirsiniz.
Tüm platformlardaki *.note dosyalarının konumunu içi http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories sayfasına bakın.\n
= SD Card=

Tomboy notlarınızı (*.note), SD Kartınızın tomdroid/ dizini altına koyun. Notlar kopyalandıktan sonra, Tercihler içerisinden Eşitleme Hizmetini SD Kart olarak ayarlayın ve Tomdroid\'in üst çubuğundaki Eşitleme logosuna dokunun.\n
Ayrıca, Tomdroid her zaman yeni katkıcılara ihtiyaç duyar. Eğer tomdroid-dev takımına ilgi duyuyorsanız, Launchpad\'de bize katılın: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Son olarak, herhangi bir sorunla karşılaştığınızda , lütfen https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid bu siteye rapor edin ki biz de geliştirmeye yardımcı olalım.

file.string: Bu başlıkta başka bir not zaten veritabanında mevcut. Lütfen çakışmayı çözmek için bir eylem seçin. Notu seçmeden önce düzenleyebilir ve aşağıdaki etiketleri kullanarak farklılıkları görebilirsiniz.
Geçerli bir metin boyutu seçmediniz. Lütfen bir numara girin.
Onaylarsanız, not listenizde silinmiş olan notlar da gösterilecektir.
Yerel sürüm zaten silinmiş. Lütfen aşağıdaki eylemlerden birini seçin.

Launchpad Contributions: Mesut Yaver https://launchpad.net/~afg-mesut Stefan Hammer https://launchpad.net/~j-4 Volkan Gezer https://launchpad.net/~volkangezer baris ozcan https://launchpad.net/~brsozcan kulkke https://launchpad.net/~kulkke zeugma https://launchpad.net/~sunder67

Tomdroid'e hoşgeldin.

 Başlamadan önce programın Beta sürümü olduğunu ve hatalar barındırabileceğini unutmayınız.

 Bu problemlerin farkındayız ve elimizden geldiğince hızlı bir şekilde bunları çözeceğiz. Sizden istediğim programı olabildiğince çabuk test etmeniz ve hataları ortaya çıkarmanız.

 Eğer bize katkıda bulunmak isterseniz, her şekildeki yardımınız bizi çok mutlu eder. launchpad.net/tomdroid adresine girip contact us' a tıklayarak bize ulaşabilirsiniz.
Not ayrıştırma hatası aldınız. Kayıtlı XML\'i kontrol ediniz.
Onaylarsanız, not listenizde not şablonları gösterilecektir.
%1$s kimlik doğrulaması başarısız. Daha sonra tekrar deneyin!
\"%1$s\" geçerli bir dosya konumu değil. Lütfen tekrar deneyin.

Tomboy, Android için geliştirilmiş, "wikiwiki" yaklaşımını kullanan basit bir arayüze sahip masaüstü not programıdır.

* Not formatları Tomboy ile uyumludur
* "Yağmurlu ve Karlı" serverlarında online not sekronizasyonu imkanı sağlar
* SD kart'tan bilgi alabilir
* Ana ekran kısayolları
* Herhangi bir uygulamaya not ve metin yollayabilir veya uygulamadan not ve metin alabilir.
* Ve Açık Kaynak!!
*Tomboy Çeviri Ekibi (Barış Özcan)
Not koleksiyonunuz ayrıştırılırken bir hata oluştu. Eğer sorunu tekrarlatabiliyorsanız, lütfen bize ulaşın!
Lütfen çakışmayı çözmek için bir eylem seçin. Notu seçmeden önce düzenleyebilir ve aşağıdaki etiketleri kullanarak farklılıkları görebilirsiniz.
Bu bilgisayarda olmayan bütün notların silinmesini istediğinize emin misiniz?
Uzakta cihazlarda bulunan bütün notları sil.
Si si istý, že chceš vymazať databázu poznámok?

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: 欢迎使用 Tomdroid！\n
您现在还没有便笺。可在“设置”下设置同步首选项。如下描述，有两种同步选项。\n
=在线同步=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
要使用该功能，可在首选项里将同步服务设为在线同步，并提供一个服务器 URL。下面是部分公共服务器：
-Tomboy 网页版 - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[用户名]/[密码]/\n
一旦设置，点击 Tomdroid 顶部处的同步标志就可以同步您的便笺。\n
请注意：本应用软件还在发展中，偶尔会出现问题，所以请你经常做备份。\n
为了了解你的笔记文件（*.note）保存的地方，请看看 http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories。\n
=SD 卡=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Tomdroid还在寻找开发者。如果你愿意为Tomdroid做出贡献的话，请在Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev 参加Tomdroid的开发者团队。\n
最后，如果您遇到任何问题，请将其报告至 https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Добро пожаловать в Tomdroid!\n
У пока нет заметок. Чтобы приступить к работе, задайте настройки синхронизации в меню Настройки. Есть две опции синхронизации, описанные ниже.\n
=Онлайн синхронизация=
Онлайн синхронизация — отличный выбор для синхронизации с Tomboy Online или вашим собственным сервером Rainy/Snowy, или любым другим сервером, поддерживающим Tomboy Web REST API.\n
Чтобы использовать его, выберите Сервис Синхронизации в пункте Онлайн Синхронизация в настройках, указав URL-адрес сервера. Вот некоторые из них:
-Tomboy сайт - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-Rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[имя пользователя]/[пароль]/\n
После установки, нажмите кнопку Синхронизация на верхней панели Tomdroid для синхронизации заметок.\n
Примечание: Вы можете создать резервную копию заметки Tomboy перед синхронизацией. Так как это приложение находится в стадии разработки, то возможно повреждение Ваших заметок.\n
Пожалуйста, ознакомьтесь с http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories перед размещением *. Обратите внимание, файлы на всех платформах.\n
=SD-Карта=

Поместите свои заметки Tomboy (*.note) на SD карту в папку tombdroid/. Когда заметки будут скопированы, установите в настройках в качестве Сервиса Синхронизации SD карту, после чего нажмите на кнопку Синхронизация на верхней панели Tomdroid.\n
Кроме того, Tomdroid всегда ищет новых участников. Присоединяйтесь к tomdroid-dev команде на Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Наконец, если у вас возникнут проблемы, пожалуйста, сообщите об этом по адресу: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Добро пожаловать в tomdroid.

Пожалуйста, учитывайте, что это beta-версия и в ней есть ошибки.

Мы осведомлены о них и работаем над их быстрейшим устранением, однако также я хотел бы получать отзывы о тестировании настолько быстро, насколько это возможно.

Если вы хотите внести свой вклад, то он будет ценен в любом виде. Свяжитесь с нами на launchpad.net/tomdroid

* Заметки не могут быть созданы, отредактированы или удалены
* Полностью переработан как для планшетов так и для смартфонов
* Синхронизируйте свою записи с подходящим веб-сервисом или сохраните на вашу SD карту
* Посылайте или принимайте заметки из любого приложения
* Более гибок чем прежде
* Доступен в еще большем количестве языков

 И многое другое, чтобы узнать обо всех изменениях, посетите https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements

Tomboy это клиент для Android. Tomboy это приложение для создания заметок, использующий подход wikiwiki к их созданию и простой интерфейс.

* Формат заметок совместим с Tomboy
* Онлайн синхронизация с Rainy, Snowy или Tomboy Online
* Перенос на SD карту
* Ярлыки для рабочего стола 
* Посылайте или принимайте текст или файлы из любого приложения 
* Open source!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Selamat Datang di Tomdroid!\n
Anda tidak memiliki catatan di sini. Untuk memulai, menetapkan preferensi Sinkronisasi Anda di bawah Setelan. Ada dua pilihan sinkronisasi dijelaskan di bawah ini.\n
=Sinkronisasi Online=
Singkronisasi Online adalah apa yang anda cari jika anda ingin mensingkronisasi Tomboy-Online, server Berhujan/Bersalju server yang mendukung Tomboy Web REST API.\n
Untuk menggunakannya, atur Layanan untuk Sinkronisasi Online di preferensi kemudian memberikan URL Server. Berikut adalah beberapa yang umum:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Setelah ditetapkan, tekan logo Sinkronisasi pada bar di atas Tomdroid untuk menyinkronkan catatan Anda.\n
Catatan: Anda mungkin ingin membuat cadangan catatan Tomboy Anda sebelum syncing, karena aplikasi ini masih dalam pengembangan dan dapat merusak catatan Tomboy Anda.\n
Silakan lihat http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories untuk lokasi *.note file pada semua platform.\n
=SD Card=

Masukan catatan Tomboy Anda (*.note) pada SD Card Anda di bawah tomdroid/. Setelah catatan yang disalin, mengatur Layanan Sync ke SD Card dalam preferensi lalu tekan logo Sync pada bar di atas Tomdroid ini.\n
Juga, Tomdroid selalu mencari kontributor baru. Jika Anda tertarik bergabung dengan tim tomdroid-dev di Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Terakhir, jika Anda menemukan masalah apapun, tolong laporkan pada: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

* Catatan kini dapat dibuat, diedit dan dihapus
* Sepenuhnya didesain ulang untuk kedua tablet dan ponsel
* Sinkronisasi catatan Anda dengan layanan web yang kompatibel atau ke kartu SD Anda
* Mengirim dan menerima file catatan atau teks dari aplikasi apapun
* Dikonfigurasi lebih dari sebelumnya
* Tersedia dalam bahasa bahkan lebih

 Dan banyak lagi, untuk daftar lengkap perubahan silakan lihat https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements

Klien Tomboy untuk Android. Tomboy adalah desktop pengambilan catatan app menggunakan pendekatan wikiwiki dan antarmuka pengguna yang sederhana.

* Format catatan kompatibilitas dengan Tomboy
* Catatan sinkronisasi online dengan Rainy, Snowy atau Tomboy online
* SD Card impor
* Layar awal pintas
* Mengirim dan menerima pesan teks atau catatan-file dari aplikasi apapun
* Open source!

Selamat Datang di Tomdroid.

Harap perhatikan bahwa ini adalah kualitas perangkat lunak beta dan bahwa itu mengandung masalah untuk diketahui.

Kami sangat menyadari masalah ini dan berniat untuk bekerja pada mereka dengan cepat tetapi saya juga ingin mendapatkan sesuatu dan diuji secepat mungkin.

Jika Anda ingin berkontribusi, membantu di semua tingkatan sangat diharapkan. Kontak pada launchpad.net/tomdroid dan hubungi kami!

Welcome to Tomdroid.

Please note that this is beta quality software and that it contains known problems.

We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.

If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!
Illegal text size chosen. Please choose a number.
\"%1$s" ෆෝල්ඩරයේ ස්ථානය වලංගු නොවේ. නැවත උත්සාහ කරන්න.
කරුණාකර ඝට්ටනය විසඳීමට ක්‍රියාමාර්ගයක් තෝරා ගන්න. ඔබට තෝරා ගැනීමට පෙර සටහන සංස්කරණය කිරීමට හෝ පහත ලේබල් ක්ලික් කර ඒවායේ වෙනස බැලීමට හැකිය.
%1$s ට දෝෂය සම්බන්ධ වෙමින් පවතී. ඔබට සිතෙන හැටියට කට්ටල අංග වලින් සකස් කිරීම අවශ්‍යයි.

පහත ගොනුවක් හෝ දඟකාර කෙල්ල සටහන් ගොනුවක් (ආනයනය කළ) හෝ සාමාන්‍ය වගන්ති ගොනුවක් (නිර්මාණය කළ නව සටහනක්) තෝරා ගන්න:
සටහන දැනටමත් පරිගණක දත්ත ගබඩාව තුළ පවතී. කරුණාකර මෙම සංඝට්ටනය විසඳීමට ක්‍රියාවක් තෝරන්න. ඔබට සටහන තෝරා ගැනීමට පෙර සංස්කරණය කිරීමට හෝ පහත වෙනස් ලේබලයන් ක්ලික් කර බැලීමට සිදු වේ.
සේවාදායකයාගේ ලිපිනය වෙනස් කළ නමුත් නව අගය ශූන්‍ය වේ.
සටහන විග්‍රහ කිරීමේ දෝෂයක් පවතී. කරුණාකර ඔබේ XML පරීක්ෂා කරන්න.

* Notes can now be created, edited and deleted
* Completely redesigned for both tablets and phones
* Sync your notes with compatible web-services or to your SD card
* Send and receive note files or text from any app
* More configurable than before
* Available in even more languages

 And much more, for a complete list of changes please see https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements

 කරුණාකර මෙය බීටා තත්වයේ මෘදුකාංගයක් බව සහ මෙහි දන්නා ගැටළු අඩංගු වන බව සටහන් කරගන්න. 

 අපි හොඳින් ඉක්මනින් මේ ගැටළු පිලිබඳ පරීක්ෂාකාරී වෙමු සහ නමුත් මට අවශ්‍ය වුණා මොනවා හෝ පිටතින් ගැනීමට සහ මම අත්දැකීම් ලැබුවා ඉක්මනින්ම වියහැකි දේ ගැන. 

 ඔබ දායක වීමට කැමති නම්, සෑම සංතෘප්ත අයෙකුටම මෙය තේරුම ගැනීමට උදව කරන්න ඔබට හැකිය. මඩුල්ලට පැනීම සඳහා launchpad.net/tomdroid වෙතින් අපට සම්බන්ධ වන්න!
ගොනුව ආනයනය කළ හැකි උපරිම ප්‍රමාණය ඉක්මවා ඇත - ඔබට එය සාමාන්‍ය වගන්තියක් බවට විශ්වාසද?

A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!
\"%1$s" ඇතුලත් කිරීම වලංගු නොවේ. කරුණාකර නැවත උත්සාහ කරන්න.
ඔබේ සටහන් සහ ආරම්භක අයදුම් සමමුහුර්ත කරන්න

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: ටොම්ඩ්රොයිඩ් වෙතට පිළිගනු ලබනවා!\n
ඔබට මෙහි තවමත් සටහන් නොමැත. ආරම්භ කිරීමට, ඔබේ සමමුහුර්තකරණය කළ වරණයන් කට්ටල අංග යටතේ සකස් කරන්න. මෙහි සමකාලීන විකල්පයන් දෙකක් පහත විස්තර කර ඇත.\n
=මාර්ගගත සමමුහුර්තකරණය=
මාර්ගගත සමමුහුර්තකරණය යනු ඔබ බලන්නේ මොනවාද ඔබට දඟකාර කෙල්ල මාර්ගගත වීමට අවශ්‍ය නම් - ටොම්බෝයි වෙබ් REST API වලින් උදව්කරන ඔබේම වැසි සහිත/හිම සහිත සර්වර් හෝ ඕනෑම සර්වර් එකක්.\n
එය භාවිතයට, වරණයන්වලින් මාරගගත සමමුහුර්තකරණයට සමමුහුර්ත සේවය සකස් කොට Server URL එක සපයන්න. මෙහි සමහරක් පොදු එකකි:
-දඟකාර කෙල්ල මාර්ගගත - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[භාවිත නම ]/[රහස්‍ය අංකය ]/\n
එකවරක් සකස්කරන්න, ටොම්ඩ්රොයිඩ්ගේ ඉහළ හරසෙ සමමුහුර්තකරණ ඔබේ සටහන් සමමුහුර්ත ලාංඡනය ට ගැටෙන්නට දෙන්න
සටහන: ඔබට ඔබේ දගකාර කෙල්ල සටහන් සමමුහුර්තකරණයට පෙර අවශ්‍ය විය හැකිය,මෙතැන් සිට අයදුම සංවර්ධනය කිරීම යටතේ ඔබේ දඟකාර කෙල්ල සටහන් දුෂ්ප්‍රතිපන්න විය හැකිය.\n
කරුණාකර *.note ගොනුවල සෑම වේදිකාවක්ම පිහිටි ස්ථානය සඳහා http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories බලන්න
=SD කාර්ඩ්පත=

ටොම්ඩ්රොයිඩ් යටතේ ඔබේ දඟකාර කෙල්ල සටහන් ඔබේ SD කාර්ඩ්පතට දමන්න/. එකවර සටහන් පිටපත් කර, සම්මුහුර්තකරණ සේවාව වරණයන් වලින් SD කාර්ඩ්පතට සකස්කර, සමමුහුර්තකරණ ලාංඡනය ටොම්ඩ්රොයිඩ්ගේ ඉහළ හරස සමඟ ගැටෙන්නට සලස්වන්න.
තවද, ටොම්ඩ්රොයිඩ් නිතරම අලුත් අධාරකරුවන් බලාගෙන සිටියි. ඔබ එය ගැන සැලකිලිමත් නම් Launchpad හි ටොම්ඩ්රොයිඩ්-dev සමඟ සම්බන්ධ වන්න: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
අවසානයේ, ඔබට ඕනෑම ප්‍රශ්නයක් මුණගැසේ නම්, කරුණාකර එය https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid දී වාර්තා කරන්න.

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Please note that this is beta quality software and that it contains known problems.

We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.

If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
On-line Synchronisation is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your note files.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Ласкаво просимо в Tomdroid!\n
У Вас поки немає заміток. Щоб приступити до роботи, задайте настройки синхронізації в меню Установки. Є дві опції синхронізації, описані нижче.\n
=Онлайн синхронізація=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
Щоб використовувати його, виберіть Сервіс Синхронізації в пункті Онлайн Синхронізація в настройках, вказавши URL-адресу сервера. Ось деякі з них:
-Tomboy сайт - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[ім\'я користувача]/[пароль]/\n
Після установки, натисніть кнопку Синхронізація на верхній панелі Tomdroid для синхронізації нотаток.\n
Примітка: Ви можете створити резервну копію замітки Tomboy перед синхронізацією. Так як це додаток знаходиться в стадії розробки, то можливе пошкодження Ваших нотаток.\n
Будь ласка, ознайомтеся з http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories перед розміщенням *. Зверніть увагу, файли на всіх платформах.\n
=SD-Карта=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Крім того, Tomdroid завжди шукає нових учасників. Приєднуйтесь до tomdroid-dev команді на Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Нарешті, якщо у Вас виникнуть проблеми, будь ласка, повідомте про це за адресою: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Будь ласка, візьміть до уваги, що це beta-версія і в ній є помилки.

Ми інформовані про про них і працюємо над якнайшвидшим усунення, однак також я хотів би отримувати відгуки про тестування настільки швидко, наскільки це можливо.

Якщо Ви хочете внести свій внесок, то він буде цінний в будь-якому вигляді. Зв'яжіться з нами на launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Bem-vindo ao Tomdroid\n
Ainda não existem notas. Para começar, defina as opções de sincronização nas definições. Existem dois métodos de sincronização:
=Sincronização web=
Se optar pela sincronização web, pode efetuar sincronizações com o serviço Tomboy-Online, com um servidor Rainy/Snowy ou qualquer outro com suporte à API Tomboy Web REST.
Para a utilizar, defina a opção Sincronização web e indique o URL do servidor. Por exemplo:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[nome_de_utilizador]/[senha]/\n
Assim que definir, clique no ícone da barra superior para sincronizar as notas.\n
Nota: deve criar uma cópia de segurança das suas notas Tomboy, uma vez que esta aplicação ainda está em desenvolvimento e pode destruir as suas notas.\n
Consulte http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories para saber a localização dos ficheiros *.note em todas as plataformas.\n
=Cartão SD=
Coloque as notas Tomboy (*.note) na pasta tomdroid do cartão SD. Assim que as notas forem copiadas, escolha Sincronização SD nas preferências e clique em Sincronizar na barra superior do Tomdroid.
O Tomdroid aceita os contributos dos utilizadores. Se estiver interessado em ajudar, integre a equipa de desenvolvimento em http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Se encontrar algum erro, reporte-o em https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Se quiser participar no projeto e ajudar no desenvolvimento, será bem recebido. Consulte launchpad.net/tomdroid e contacte-nos!

* Criação, edição e eliminação de notas
* Para telefones e tablets
* Sincronização de notas na web ou locais.

Um cliente para o Tomboy no Android. O Tomboy é uma aplicação que utiliza uma estrutura wiki e uma interface simples.

* Formatos compatíveis com o Tomboy
* Sincronização de notas com os serviços Rainy, Snowy ou Tomboy Online
* Importação de notas no cartão SD

* Envio e receção de notas e ficheiros de qualquer aplicação

Üdvözlet a Tomdroidban.

Kérem tartsa észben, hogy ez egy béta-minőségű szoftver, ami tartalmazhat ismert hibákat.

Jól ismerjük ezeket a problémákat, de én már ki akartam adni, és letesztelni amilyen gyorsan csak lehetséges.

Ha hozzá szeretne járulni bármilyen szinten, méltányolnánk. Pattanjon a launchpad.net/tomdroid fedélzetére velünk!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Üdvözöljük a Tomdroidban!!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online szinkronizálás=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[felhasználónév]/[jelszó]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD kártya=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Végül, ha problémát észlel, kérjük, jelentse ezen a címen: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

file.string: Válasszon egy Tomboy jegyzetfájlt (amit a program importálni fog) vagy egy egyszerű szöveges fájlt (amiből a program új jegyzetet hoz létre):

* Notes can now be created, edited and deleted
* Completely redesigned for both tablets and phones
* Sync your notes with compatible web-services or to your SD card
* Send and receive note files or text from any app
* More configurable than before
* Available in even more languages

 And much more, for a complete list of changes please see https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements

A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!

Ez vissza fogja állítani a helyi jegyzeteket bármilyen állapotukban is vannak azok a távoli szolgáltatón. Biztos, hogy ezt akarja tenni?

We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.

If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Bienvenido a Tomdroid!\n
No tiene notas aún. Para empezar, establezca en Configuración sus preferencias de sincronización. Hay dos opciones de sincronización que se describen a continuación.\n
=Sincronización en línea=
Si buscas sincronizar Tomdroid en línea necesitarás tu propio servidor Rainy/Snowy o algún otro con soporte para Tomdroid Web REST API. \n
Para usarlo, fije el servicio de sincronización a sincronización en línea en las preferencias, luego proporcione una URL de servidor. Aquí hay algunas públicas:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Una vez configurado, pulse el logo Sync en la barra superior Tomdroid para sincronizar sus notas. \n
Nota: Quizás quieras sincronizar tus notas en Tomdroid antes de sincronizar, como esta app aún está en desarrollo puede que ser corrompan algunos datos
Por favor, visita http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories para encontrar los ficheros *.note de todas las plataformas.\n
=SD Card=

Coloca tus notas de Tomdroid (*.note) en el directorio /tomdroid de tu tarjeta SD. Una vez que las notas se copien, selecciona en Preferencias el Servicio de Sincronización con la tarjeta SD y después pulsa sobre el logo de Sincronización de la barra superior de Tomdroid.\n
Además, Tomdroid está buscando colaboradores en todo momento. Si estás interesado en entrar en el equipo de desarrollo dentro de Launchpad, visita http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Por último, si tienes algún problema, por favor informelo a: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Un cliente Tomboy para Android. Tomboy es una aplicación toma-nota usando un enfoque wikiwiki y con una simple interfaz de usuario.

* Formato de nota de compatibilidad con Tomboy
* Sincronización de nota online con Rainy, Snowy o Tomboy Online
* Importación desde tarjeta SD
* Accesos directos de la pantalla principal
* Enviar y recibir texto o archivos-nota desde cualquier aplicación
* Código abierto!

Bienvenido a Tomdroid.

Tenga en cuenta que esta es una versión beta del software y que contiene problemas conocidos.

Estamos conscientes de estos problemas y tenemos la intención de trabajar en forma rápida pero también queremos sacarlo y probarlo lo más rápido posible.

Ayuda a todos los niveles será recibida si deseas participar. Súbete a bordo en launchpad.net/tomdroid y ponte en contacto con nosotros!

Si se selecciona, mostrará las notas eliminadas en la lista de notas.

Velkomin í Tomdroid.

Vinsamlegast athugið að þetta er hugbúnaður með forútgáfugæðum og hefur þekkt vandamál.

Við erum vel vör við þessi vandamál og vinnum á þeim eins hratt og við getum en ég vildi einnig ýta einhverju út og fá það prófað við fyrsta tækifæri.

Ef þú vilt leggja þitt af mörkum, þá er hjálp á öllum sviðum mjög vel þegin. Hoppaðu um borð á launchpad.net/tomdroid og hafðu samband við okkur!
Vinsamlegast veldu aðgerð til að leysa úr árekstrinum. Þú getur breytt annarihvorri glósunni áður en þú velur, eða skoðað muninn með því að smella á merkin fyrir neðan.
Tenging við þjóninn mistókst, vinsamlegast athugaðu að slóðin sem þú slóst inn sé rétt.
Breyttu merkjunum fyrir neðan, aðskilin með kommu.
Það eru engar glósubækur í gagnagrunninum.
Tókst að afrita glósur á SD kort.
\"%1$s\" er ekki gild staðsetning möppu. Vinsamlegast reyndu aftur!
Ertu viss um að þú viljir eyða öllum glósum á ytri þjónustunni?

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Velkomin í Tomdroid!\n
Þú hefur engar glósur hér enn. Til að byrja, stilltu samstillingar í stillingum. Það eru tveir samstillingarmöguleikar útskýrðir fyrir neðan.\n
=Samstilling yfir net=
Samstilling yfir net er það sem þú ert að leita eftir til að samstilla við Tomboy-Online, þinn eigin Rainy/Snowy þjón eða hvaða þjón sem styður Tomboy Web REST API.\n
Til að nota það, stilltu samstillingaþjónustu á samstillingu yfir net í stillingum og veittu síðan slóð á þjón. Hér eru nokkrir opinberir:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Þegar stillt er, smelltu á samstillingatáknið í efstu stiku Tomdroid til að samstilla glósur þínar.\n
Athugaðu: þú vilt kannski taka afrit af Tomboy glósum þínum fyrir samstillingu, þar sem þetta forrit er ennþá í þróun og gæti skemmt Tomboy glósur þínar.\n
Vinsamlegast athugaðu http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories til að sjá staðsetningu *.note skráa á öllum kerfum.\n
=SD kort=

Settu Tomboy glósur (*.note) á SD kortið þitt undir tomdroid/. Þegar glósurnar hafa verið afritaðar, stilltu samstillingaþjónustu á SD kort í stillingum og smelltu síðan á samstillingatáknið í efstu stiku Tomdroid.
Einnig, þá er Tomdroid alltaf að leita að nýjum framleggjendum. Ef þú hefur áhuga gakktu í tomdroid-dev liðið á Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Í síðasta lagi, ef þú lendir í einhverju vandamáli, vinsamlegast tilkynntu það á: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

* Notes can now be created, edited and deleted
* Completely redesigned for both tablets and phones
* Sync your notes with compatible web-services or to your SD card
* Send and receive note files or text from any app
* More configurable than before
* Available in even more languages

 And much more, for a complete list of changes please see https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements
Engar glósur eru í gagnagrunn Tomdroid.

A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Welcome to Tomdroid.

Please note that this is beta quality software and that it contains known problems.

We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.

If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!

Добродошли у Томадроид.

Молим, обратите пажњу да је ово мекотворина бета квалитета и да садржи познате потешкоће.

Свесни смо тих појава и намеравамо да радимо на њима брзо, али, желео сам да нешто објавим и опробам што пре.

Уколико желите да допринесете, помоћ у неким областима је добродошла. Прискочите на launchpad.net/tomdroid у обратите нам се!
Ако је означено, приказаће избрисане белешке на списку белешки.
Молим, одаберите радњу за разрешавање сукоба. Или морате уредити белешку пре одабира, или погледајте разлику кликом на натписе испод.
Белешка са тим насловом већ постоји у остави података. Молим, одаберите радњу за разрешавање сукоба. Можете уредити белешку пре одабира, или прегледати разлику кликом на натписе испод.
Десила се грешка при обради белешке. Молим, проверите ИксМЛ датотеку.
Апликација за хватање белешки са могућношћу усклађивања на мрежи, сагласна са Томичиним белешкама.
Молим, сачекајте док се бележница учита.
Нисам пронашао ни једну белешку у %1$s.
Да ли умножити све месне белешке на СД картицу? То може преписати постојеће белешке са СД картице.
Датотека прелази највећу величину увоза - да ли сте сигурни се ради о чистом тексту?
Да ли да преузмем све белешке са СД картице? То може избрисати постојеће белешке.
Нисам успео да прочитам датотеку белешке.
Ако ј означено, приказиваће обрасце у списку белешки.

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Добродошли код Томадроида!\n
Овде још увек немате белешке. Да би почели, подесите својства усклађивања у поставкама. Постоје две могућности усклађивања описане испод.\n
=Усклађивање преко мреже=
Треба Вам услађивање преко мреже ако желите да ускладите белешке са Томицом на мрежи, својим Rainy/Snowy служитељем или било којим сервером који подржава Tomboy Web REST API.\n
Да би га користили, поставите услугу усклађивања на усклађивање преко мреже у поставкама, а онда подесите адресу служитеља. Ево неких јавних:
-Томица на мрежи - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Када се подеси, притисните знак усклађивања на Томадроидовој горњој траци за усаглашавање бележака.\n
Примедба: Можда желите да направите резервни умножак пре усклађивања, пошто је ова апликација још увек у развоју, и могла би искварити Ваше Томичине белешке.\n
Молим, погледајте http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories да би знали путању *.note датотека на свим платформама.\n
=СД картица=
Поставите белешке (*.note) на СД картицу у tomdroid/. Када се белешке умноже, поставите услугу усклађивања на СД картицу у поставкама, затим притисните знак усклађивања на горњој траци Томадроида.\n
Такође, Томадроид стално тражи нове доприносиоце. Ако вас занима придружите се Томадроидовој развојној дружини на Лансирној рампи: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Најзад, ако наиђете на потешкоће, молим, пријавите их на: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

file.string: Уредите ознаке испод, раздвајајући их запетама
Изаберите датотеку испод која је или Томичина белешка (која ће бити увезена), или обична текстуална датотека (од које ће се направити нова белешка)
Изабрана је недозвољена величина текста. Молим, изаберите број.
Десила се грешка при повезивању са %1$s. Вероватно требате подесити овлашћења у “поставкама“.

* Белешке се могу стварати, уређивати и брисати
* Потпуно је прилагођен програм за телефоне и таблице
* Усклађивање са Веб услугама и СД картицом
* Слање и примање датотека белешки из било ког програма
* Више могућности подешавања
* Доступност на више језика

 И много више. За потпуни списак измена погледајте https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements
Да ли сте сигурни да желите очистити складиште података белешки?
Нисам успео да пронађем затражену белешку. Можда је обрисана или је уклоњена кроз усклађивање.
Изаберите која услуга усклађивања ће се користити
Повежи бројеве телефона са програмом позиваром
Веза са служитељем није успела, молим, проверите да ли је адреса коју сте унели исправна.
Умножи све белешке на СД картицу при чувању
Десила се грешка при покушају расчлањивања збирке белешки. Ако сте у могућности да опишете проблем, молим, обратите нам се!
Успешно су повраћене белешке са СД картице.
Програм за хватање бележака сагласан са Томичиним белешкама.
Фасцикла „%1$s“ још увек није направљена. Молим, повежите Ваш уређај са рачунаром, направите фасциклу и испуните је *.note датотекама.
Пријава на %1$s није успела. Покушајте опет касније!
Успешно је направљен резервни умножак белешки на СД картицу.
Очисти све белешке из месне оставе података
„%1$s“ није исправна ставка. Молим, покушајте поново!
Да ли желите опозвати измене и вратити белешку на последње сачувано издање?
Ово ће вратити месне белешке на издање које постоји код удаљеног служитеља. Да ли сте сигурни да то желите?
Обриши све белешке код удаљеног служитеља

Ово су Томичине белешке за Андроид. Томица (tomboy) је бележница која користи викивики начин и има једноставно сучеље.

*Облик белешки је сагласан са Томицом
* Усклађивање преко мреже са Кишним, Снежним и Томицом на мрежи
* Пречице на почетном екрану
*Слање и примање текста и датотека белешки из програма
*Отворени код!
Odaberite radnju za rješavanje konflikta. Možete urediti bilješku prije odabira ili pregledati razlike odabirom oznake ispod.
Očisti sve bilješke iz lokalne baze
Sigurno želite dobaciti postavke i vratiti bilješku na prijašnju verziju?

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Dobrodošli u Tomdroid!\n
Još nemate bilješki. Za početak namjestite postavke usklađivanja pod Postavkama. Dva načina usklađivanja su opisani ispod.\n
=Mrežno usklađivanje=
Mrežno usklađivanje koristite za sinkronizaciju s Tomboy-Online, vlastiti Rainy/Snowy server ili neki drugi server koji podržava Tomboy Web REST API.\n
Za korištenje, postavite Sinkronizacijski servis na mrežno usklađivanje u Postavkama te zatim unesite URL servera. Nekoliko javnih primjera:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Jednom postavljeno, odaberite sinkronizacijski logo u traci na vrhu za usklađivanje.\n
Napomena:poželjno je napraviti sigurnosnu kopiju prije sinkronizacije, ova aplikacija je i dalje u razvoju te može oštetiti Tomboy bilješke.\n
Pogledajte http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories za lokaciju *.note datoteka na svim platformama.\n
=SD kartica=

Postavite Tomboy bilješke (*.note) na SD karticu pod tomdroid/. Nakon kopiranja bilješki, postavite Sinkronizacijski servis na SD karticu pod Postavkama i zatim učinite usklađivanje odabirom ikone u gornjoj traci.\n
Također, Tomdroid uvijek traži nove suradnike. Ako ste zainteresirani za posao, pridružite se tomdroid-dev timu na Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Na kraju ako susretnete problem ili grešku, molimo javite na: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!
Poveži adrese na aplikaciju za karte
Neuspjelo spajanje na poslužitelj, provjerite unesenu adresu.

Dobrodošli u Tomdroid.

Molimo pripazite da je program i dalje u beta fazi te sadrži poznate probleme.

U potpunosti smo svjesni tih problema i namjeravamo raditi na njima brzo ali sam htio objaviti što prije u cilju testiranja.

Ako želite doprinijeti razvoju, pomoć se cijeni na svim razinama. Posjetite launchpad.net/tomdroid i javite nam se!

Wybierz plik poniżej, który jest plikiem notatki Tomboy (który zostanie zaimportowany) lub plikiem ze zwykłym tekstem (co spowoduje utworzenie nowej notatki):

Witaj w Tomdroid.

Proszę pamiętać, że jako wersja beta, program zawiera pewne błędy.

Jesteśmy tego świadomomi i pracujemy nad jak najszybszym ich naprawieniem, ale chceliśmy udostępnić aplikację jak najszybciej, by mogła zostać przetestowana.

Jeśli chciałbyś się zaangażować, każda pomoc będzie bardzo mile widziana. Skontaktuj się z nami na launchpad.net/tomdroid!
Linkuj numery telefonów do aplikacji telefonu

Czy jesteś pewny, że chcesz usunąć tę notatkę?
Wybierz akcję by rozwiązać konflikt. Możesz edytować jedną z notatek przed wyborem, lub obejrzeć różnice klikając na etykiety poniżej.
Jesteś pewny, że chcesz skasować wszystkie notatki ze zdalnej usługi?

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Witaj w Tomdroid!\n
Nie masz jeszcze żadnych notatek. By rozpocząć, ustaw swoje preferencje Synchronizacji w Ustawieniach. Istnieją dwie opcje synchronizacji, opisane poniżej.\n
=Synchronizacha online=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
By tego użyć, ustaw usługę synchronizacji na Synchronizację online w preferencjach, a następnie podaj URL serwera. Tu jest kilka publicznych serwerów:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Po ustawieniu, kliknij logo Synchronizacji na górnym pasku Tomdroid by zsynchronizować swoje notatki.\n
Uwaga: zalecane jest zrobić kopię zapasową Twoich notatek z Tomboy przed synchronizacja, gdyż ta aplikacja jest nadal w fazie rozwoju i może uszkodzić Twoje notatki z Tomboy.\n
Odwiedź http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories by poznać lokalizacje plików *.note na wszystkich platformach.\n
=Karta SD=

Umieść swoje notatki z Tomboy (*.note) na karcie SD w folderze tomdroid/. Po skopiowaniu notatek, ustaw usługę synchronizacji jako karta SD w preferencjach i kliknij logo synchronizacji na górnym pasku Tomdroid.\n
Tomdroid jest także otwarty na wszelką pomoc. Jeśli jesteś zainteresowany, dołącz do grupy tomdroid-dev na Launchpadzie: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Jeśli napotkasz jakiś problem z aplikacją, prosimy o zgłoszenie go tutaj: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Ein Tomboy Client für Android. Tomboy is eine Desktop-App für Notizen, welche eine einfache Benutzeroberfläche und eine wikiwiki-Arbeitsweise verwendet.

* Kompatibilität der Notizen zu Tomboy
* Online-Synchronisation mit Rainy, Snowy oder Tomboy Online
* SD-Karten Import
* Verknüpfung auf dem Startbildschirm
* Versenden und Empfangen von Text und Notizen zu/von allen Apps
* Open source!
Die Datei überschreitet die maximale Importgröße - Sind Sie sicher, dass es ausschließlich Klartext ist?

* Notizen können nun erstellt, editiert und gelöscht werden
* Komplett neues Design für sowohl Tablets als auch Handys
* Synchronisation zu kompatiblen Web-Services oder zur SD-Karte
* Senden und empfangen von Notiz-Dateien oder Text zu oder von jedem App
* Mehr Konfigurationsmöglichkeiten als zuvor
* In noch mehr Sprachen verfügbar

 Und vieles mehr, für eine komplette Liste siehe https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements

Willkommen zu Tomdroid.

Bitte beachten Sie, dass dies Beta-Software ist, die bekannte Fehler beinhaltet.

Uns allen sind diese Probleme bekannt und wir beabsichtigen, sie schleunigst zu beheben, jedoch wollte ich ebenfalls so früh wie möglich eine Version zum Testen veröffentlichen.

Sollten Sie gewillt sein, sich zu beteiligen, würden wir Hilfe an jeder Stelle begrüßen. Öffnen Sie dazu einfach launchpad.net/tomdroid und kontaktieren Sie uns!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Willkommen bei Tomdroid!\n
Sie haben hier keine Notizen. Am Anfang bitte die Synchronisationsoptionen unter Einstellungen anpassen. Es gibt zwei unten beschriebene Synchronisationsoptionen.\n
=Online-Synchronisierung=

Online-Synchronisation ist das, wo nach Sie suchen, wenn Sie mit Tomboy-Online, Ihrem eigenen Rainy/Snowy Server oder irgend einem andrem Server, der die Tomboy Web REST API unterstützt, verbinden wollen .\n
Um dies zu verwenden, stellen Sie den Synchronisations-Service in den Einstellungen auf Online-Synchronisation und geben Sie eine Server-URL an. Hier sind einige öffentliche:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Einmal eingestellt, drücken Sie auf das Synchronisations-Logo an der Oberseite von Tomboy, um Ihre Notizen zu synchronisieren.\n
Anmerkung: Eine Sicherung der Tomboy Notizen wird empfohlen, da diese App sich noch in der Entwicklung befindet und Notizen beschädigt werden können.\n
Bitte besuche http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories um den Ort der *.note Dateien auf allen Plattformen herauszufinden .\n
=SD-Karte=

Legen Sie Ihre Tomboy Notizen (*.note) auf Ihre SD-Karte unter tomdroid/. Wenn die Notizen einmal kopiert wurden, stellen sie nun den Synchronisation-Service auf Ihre SD Card unter Einstellungen ein, dann betätigen Sie das Synchronisation-Logo in Tomdroid\'s oberer Leiste .\n
Auch Tomdroid braucht immer neue Entwickler. Wenn Sie Interesse haben, treten Sie dem Tomdroid-Entwickler-Team im Launchpad bei: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Zuletzt: Wenn Sie eine Fehler finden, berichten Sie diesen bitte auf: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Aplikace pro ukládání poznámek s online synchronizací kompatibilní s aplikací Tomboy.

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Vítejte v Tomdroidu!\n
Nemáte zde zatím žádné poznámky. Začněte nastavením synchronizace v NastaveníNíže jsou popsány dvě synchronizační možnosti.\n
=Online synchronizace=
Použijte Online Synchronizaci v případě, že chcete synchronizovat s Tomboy-Online, s vaším vlastním Rainy/Snowy serverem nebo s jakýmkoliv jiným serverem podporujícím Tomboy Web REST API. \n
Pro použití nastavte synchronizační službu na online synchronizaci in možnostech, pak nastavte URL serveru. Zde je několik veřejných:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Jakmile je nastaveno, klikněte na synchronizační logo na liště nahoře pro synchronizaci vašich poznámek.\n
Poznámka: je vhodné zálohovat vaše Tomboy poznámky před synchronizací, protože tato aplikace je stále ve vývoji a mohla by poškodit vaše Tomboy poznámky.\n
Navštivte http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories pro zjištění lokace *.note souborů na všech platformách.\n
=SD karta=

Vložte vaše Tomboy poznámky (*.note) na vaši SD kartu do adresáře tomdroid/. Jakmile budou vaše poznámky zkopírovány, nastavte Sync Service na SD kartu v nastavení a poté stiskněte Sync logo na horní liště Tomdroidu.\n
Tomdroid také stále hledá nové přispěvatele. Pokud vás nabídka zaujala, přidejte se do tomdroid-dev týmu na Launchpadu: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Pokud naleznete jakýkoliv problém, oznamte ho prosím na: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

* Notes can now be created, edited and deleted
* Completely redesigned for both tablets and phones

Un client Tomboy pour Android. Tomboy est une app de prise de note sur le modèle des wiki et avec une interface simple.

* Compatibilité des formats de note avec Tomboy
* Synchronisation des notes en ligne avec Rainy, Snowy ou Tomboy Online
* Importation depuis les cartes SD
* Raccourcis sur l'écran d'accueil
* Envoyez et recevez du texte ou des notes depuis n'importe quelle app
* Open source!

Nous sommes au courant de ses problèmes et nous avons l'intention de les résoudre au plus vite mais cela demande du temps.

Si vous le souhaitez, vous pouvez contribuer au projet. Pour se faire, allez sur le site internet : launchpad.net/tomdroid et contactez nous. Toute aide sera appréciée.

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Bienvenu sur TomDroid !\n
Vous n\'avez pas de note pour l\'instant. Pour démarrer, réglez vos préférences de Synchronisation dans Préférences. Il y a deux options de synchronisation décrites ci-dessous.\n
=Synchronisation en Ligne=

La Synchronisation en Ligne est ce que vous cherchez si vous souhaitez synchroniser avec Tomboy-Online, votre propre serveur Rainy/Snowy ou avec n\'importe quel serveur supportant l\'API REST de Tomboy Web.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy en ligne - https://edge.tomboy-onligne.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[nom d\'utilisateur]/[mot de passe]/\n
Une fois paramétré, appuyez sur le logo Sync dans la barre du haut, de Tomdroid afin de synchroniser vos notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Veuillez regarder sur http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories pour le chemin de tous les fichiers *.note sur toutes les plateformes.\n
=Carte SD=

Placez vos note Tomboy (*.note) dans le répertoire tomdroid/ de votre carte SD. Une fois que les notes seront copiées, définissez Le service le service de synchronisation à Carte SD dans les préférences puis appuyez sur le logo de synchronisation dans la barre Tomdroid en haut de l’écran.\n
De plus, Tomdroid est toujours en recherche de nouveau contributeur. Si vous êtes intéressé joignez l\'équipe tomdroid-dev sur Launchpad : http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Pour finir, si vous rencontrez un quelconque problème, merci de le rapporter sur : https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

\"%1$s\" n\'est pas un chemin de dossier valide. Veuillez réessayer !
Ceci remplacera vos notes locales par la version présente sur le service distant. Etes-vous sûr de vouloir continuer ?

Une note possédant le même titre existe déjà dans la base de donnée. Veuillez choisir une action pour résoudre le conflit. Vous pouvez éditer la note avant de choisir, ou voir les différences en cliquant sur l\'étiquette ci-dessous.

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

* Notes can now be created, edited and deleted
* Completely redesigned for both tablets and phones
* Sync your notes with compatible web-services or to your SD card
* Send and receive note files or text from any app
* More configurable than before
* Available in even more languages

 And much more, for a complete list of changes please see https://launchpad.net/tomdroid/+announcements

A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!
This will revert a local note to whatever version exist on the remote service. Are you sure you want to do this?

Welcome to Tomdroid.

Please note that this is beta quality software and that it contains known problems.

We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.

If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!
