A Tomboy client for Android. Tomboy is a desktop note-taking app using a wikiwiki approach and a simple user interface.

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts
* Send and receive text or note-files from any app
* Open source!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welkom in Tomdroid!\n
U heeft hier nog geen notities. Om te beginnen, stel uw Synchronisatie voorkeuren in onder Instellingen. Hieronder worden de twee synchronisatie opties beschreven.
=Online Synchronisatie=
Online-synchronisatie is wat u zoekt als u wilt synchroniseren met Tomboy-Online, uw eigen Rainy/Snowy-server of elke andere server die de Tomboy Web REST-API ondersteunt.\n
Om dit te gebruiken, stel de Synchronisatie Service in op Online Synchronisatie en geef een server-adres in. Hier zijn een aantal van de openbare adressen:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[gebruikersnaam]/[wachtwoord]/\n
Als dit is ingesteld kunt U op het Synchronisatie-logo op Tomdroid\'s bovenste balk drukken om uw notities te synchroniseren.\n
Noot: het is aan te raden uw Tomboy-notities te backuppen alvorens te synchroniseren omdat deze app nog steeds in ontwikkeling is en wellicht uw Tomboy-notities kan beschadigen.
Zie alstublieft http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories voor de locatie van de *.note-bestanden op alle besturingssystemen.\n
=SD-kaart=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Ten laatste, als U problemen tegenkomt, meld deze dan a.u.b. op https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Benvenuto in Tomdroid!\n
Non hai ancora nessuna nota. Per cominciare, metti le tue Preferenze di sincronizzazione nel menu Settings. Ci sono due opzioni di sincronizzazione descritte sotto.\n
=Sincronizzazione in linea=
La sincronizzazione online è quella che stai cercando se vuoi sincronizzare Tomboy-Online, il tuo Rainy/Snovy server oppure qualsiasi server supportato dal Tomboy Web REST API.\n
Per usarlo, metti Sincronizzazione Online nel Servizio di Sincronizzazione, dalle preferenze e poi procura un indirizzo URL del Server. Ecco alcune delle note pubbliche:
-Tomboy in linea - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[nomeutente]/[password]/\n
Una volta impostata, premi il logo di Sync nella barra alta di Tomdroid per sincronizzare le tue note.\n
Nota: potresti fare un back up delle tue note Tomboy prima di sincronizzare, siccome questa app è ancora sotto sviluppo e può corrompere le tue note Tomboy.\n
Per favore guarda http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories per la locazione dei file *.note in tutte le piattaforme.\n
=Scheda SD=

Metti le note Tomboy (*.note) nella carta SD in tomdroid/. Quando le note saranno copiate, attiva Sincronizzazione del servizio nella carta SD nelle preferenze e poi attiva la logo Sincronizzazione nel Tomdroid bar.\n
Poi, Tomdroid sta cercando nuovi contributori. Se sei interessato aderisci nel team di tomdroid-dev in Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Per finire, se incontri qualunque problema, per favore riportalo su: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

* Note format compatibility with Tomboy
* Online note synchronization with Rainy, Snowy or Tomboy Online
* SD Card importation
* Home screen shortcuts

Selamat datang ke Tomdroid.

Perhatian, ini adalah perisian berkualiti beta yang mana ia mengandungi masalah.

Kami menyedari isu ini dan akan menyelesaikannya secepat mungkin tetapi saya juga mahukannya diuji secepat yang boleh.

Jika anda ingin memberi sumbangan, apa jua bantuan amat diharapkan. Sila lawati launchpad.net/Tomdroid dan hubungi kami!

Klien Tomboy untuk Android. Tomboy adalah apl pengambilan-nota dekstop yang menggunakan pendekatan wikiwiki dan antaramuka pengguna yang ringkas.

* Keserasian format nota dengan Tomboy
* Penyegerakan nota atas-talian dengan Rainy, Snowy atau Tomboy Atas-Talian
* Pengimportan Kad SD
* Pintasan skrin rumah
* Hantar dan terima teks atau fail-nota dari mana-mana aplikasi
* Bersumber terbuka!
Padam semua nota dari perkhidmatan jauh

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Selamat Datang ke Tomdroid!\n
Anda tidak mempunyai nota disini. Untuk mula, tetapkan keutamaan Penyegerakan anda dibawah Tetapam. Terdapat dua pilihan penyegerakan yang diterangkan dibawah.
=Penyegerakan Atas Talian=
Penyegerakan atas talian adalah apa yang anda cari jika anda mahu segerak ke Tomboy-Online, pelayan Rainy/Snowy atau mana-mana pelayan yang menyokong API REST Web Tomboy.\n
Untuk gunakannya, tetapkan Perkhidmatan kepada Penyegerakan Atas Talian dalam keutmamaan kemudian sediakan URL Pelayan. Disini terdapat beberapa pelayan awam:
-Tomboy Atas Talian - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Bila sudah ditetapkan, tekan logo segerak pada palang atas Tomdroid untuk segerakam nota anda.\n
Perhatian: anda mungkin mahu sandar nota Tomboy anda sebelum menyegerak, kerana aplikasi ini masih dibawah pembangunan dan mungkin merosakkan nota Tomboy.\n
Sila rujuk http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories untuk lokasi fail *.note pada semua platform.\n
=Kad SD=

Letak nota Tomboy anda (*.n0ote) ke dalam Kad CD anda dibawah tomdroid/. Bila nota telah disalin, tetapkan Perkhidmatan Segerak ke Kad SD dalam keutamaan kemudian tekan logo Segerak pada palang atas Tomdroid.\n
Juga, Tomdroid juga sentiasa mencari penyumbang baru. Jika anda berminat sertai pasukan tomdroid-dev di Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
AKhir sekali, jika anda mengalami sebarang masalah, sila laporkannya di: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Bem-vindo ao Tomdroid!\n
Você não tem notas aqui ainda. Para começar, ajuste suas preferências de Sincronização em Configurações. Existem duas opções de sincronização descritas abaixo.\n
=Sincronização Online=
Sincronização Online é o que você procura se quer sincronizar com o Tomboy-Online, seu próprio servidor Rainy/Snowy ou qualquer servidor que suporta o Tomboy Web REST API.\n
Para usá-lo, ajuste o Serviço de Sincronização para Sincronização Online em preferências então providencie uma URL de Servidor. Aqui estão alguns públicos:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[usuario]/[senha]/\n
Quando ajustado, clique no logotipo de Sincronização na barra superior do Tomdroid para sincronizar suas notas.\n
Nota: Você pode querer fazer backup de suas notas do Tomboy antes de sincronizar, pois este aplicativo ainda está em desenvolvimento e pode corromper suas notas Tomboy.\n
Consulte http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Diretórios para o localização do *.note arquivos em todas as plataformas.\n
=Cartão SD=

Coloque suas notas Tomboy (*.note) em seu cartão SD em Tomdroid/. Uma vez que as notas são copiadas, defina o serviço de sincronização para o cartão SD nas preferências, em seguida, aperte no logotipo Sync na barra superior do Tomdroid.\n
Além disso, Tomdroid está sempre procurando por novos colaboradores. Se você está interessado em se juntar à equipe tomdroid-dev no Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Por fim, se encontrar qualquer problema, por favor relate-o em: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Benvido a Tomdroid!\n
Aínda non tes notas. Para comezar, axusta as túas preferencias de sincronización no menú Axustes. As dúas opcións que tes descrébense debaixo.\n
= Sincronización en liña=
Se queres sincronizar en liña precisas o teu propio servidor Rainy/Snowy ou calquera outro servidor que ature o Tomdroid Web REST API.\n
Para usalo, escolle o Servizo de Sincronización en liña nas túas preferencias, despois engade a URL de servidor. Aquí hai algunhas que son públicas:
-Tomboy en liña- https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Cando o selecciones, pulsa no icono de Sincronización da barra superior de Tomdroid para sincroniza-las túas notas.\n
Nota: Quizais desexes facer unha copia das túas notas de Tomdroid antes de sincronizar, como esta app aínda está en desenvolvemento pode estragar algúns datos.
Por favor, visita http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories para atopar os ficheiros *.note en tódalas plataformas.\n
=Tarxeta SD=

Engade as túas notas de Tomdroid (*.note) na túa tarxeta SD no directorio /tomdroid. Cando as notas se copien, axusta o Servizo de sincronización cara a tarxeta SD no menú preferencias, entón pulsa o icono de Sincronización na barra superior de Tomdroid.\n
Tamén, Tomdroid está sempre buscando novos colaboradores. Se estás interesado en pertencer ó equipo de desenvolvemento de Tomdroid en Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Para rematar, se te atopas con algún erro, por favor, infórmanos en https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: مرحباً بك فى برنامج توم درويد!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=المزامنه عبر الشبكه العنكبوتيه=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
ﻹستخدامها عليك ضبط نوع خدمه المزامنه على المزامنه عبر الشبكه العنكبوتيه فى اﻹعدادات ثم تزويد البرنامج بمسار مورد منمط "رابط" لخادم. اليك بعض العموميه منهم:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
بعد الضبط ، انقر على شعار علامه التزامن الموجود فى شريط توم درويد العلوى لبدأ مزامنه مُلاحظاتك.\n
يوَصَى بشده بعمل نسخ إحتياطى لجميع مُلاحظاتك قبل بدأ عمليه المزامنه ، حيث ان توم درويد حالياً مازال فى مرحله تطويريه وقد يُفِسِد المُلاحظات.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
وايضاً ، توم درويد يبحث عن المزيد من المساهمات. إذا كنت ترغب فى المساعده فيُرجى اﻹنضمام لفريق تطوير توم درويد على منصه اﻹطلاق من خلال : http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
واخيراً ، إذا واجهت اى علل فبرجاء إبلاغ الفريق من خلال : https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Benvinguts al Tomdroid.

Tingueu en compte que es tracta d'un programari en fase "beta" i que conté problemes coneguts.

Som ben conscients d'aquests inconvenients i intentem treballar-hi de pressa, tot i que també volem tenir quelcom llest i provat el més aviat possible.

Si voleu contribuir-hi us agrairem qualsevol tipus d'ajuda. Uniu-vos a launchpad.net/tomdroid i contacteu amb nosaltres!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Tomdroid قا مەرھابا.

دىققەت بۇ يۇمشاق دېتال سىناق باسقۇچىدا بولۇپ ئۇنىڭدا مەلۇملۇق مەسىلىلەر بار.

بىزمۇ بۇ مەسىلىلەرنى بىلىمىز ھەم تېز پۇرسەتتە ئوڭشايمىز، مەنمۇ تىرىشىپ بۇ مەسىلىلەرنى ھەل قىلىپ ۋە تېزلىكتە سىنايمەن.

ئەگەر سىز بۇنىڭ ئۈچۈن تۆھپە قوشماقچى بولسىڭىز، قارشى ئالىمىز. launchpad.net/tomdroid ئارقىلىق بىز بىلەن ئالاقە قىلىڭ!
بۇ Tomdroid نىڭ ساندانىدا خاتىرە يوق.

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

Welcome to Tomdroid.

Please note that this is beta quality software and that it contains known problems.

We are well aware of these issues and intend to work on them quickly but I also wanted to get something out and tested as quickly as possible.

If you would like to contribute, help at all levels would be appreciated. Hop on board on launchpad.net/tomdroid and contact us!

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Welcome to Tomdroid!\n
You have no notes here yet. To get started, set your Synchronization preferences under Settings. There are two synchronization options described below.\n
=Online Synchronization=
Online Synchronization is what you are looking for if you want to sync to Tomboy-Online, your own Rainy/Snowy server or any server supporting the Tomboy Web REST API.\n
To use it, set Sync Service to Online Synchronization in preferences then provide a Server URL. Here are some of the public ones:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Once set, hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar to synchronize your notes.\n
Note: you might want to back up your Tomboy notes before syncing, since this app is still under development and may corrupt your Tomboy notes.\n
Please see http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for the location of the *.note files on all platforms.\n
=SD Card=
Put your Tomboy notes (*.note) on your SD Card under tomdroid/. Once the notes are copied, set Sync Service to SD Card in preferences then hit the Sync logo on Tomdroid\'s top bar.\n
Also, Tomdroid is always looking for new contributors. If you are interested join the tomdroid-dev team on Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Lastly, if you encounter any issue, please report it at: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

string-array.name: firstNoteContent
string-array.item: Velkommen til Tomdroid!\n
Du har ingen noter her endnu. For at komme i gang skal du indstille dine synkronisering præferencer under Indstillinger. Der er to synkroniseringsindstillinger beskrevet nedenfor.\n
=Online synkronisering=
Online Synkronisering er, hvad du leder efter, hvis du ønsker at synkronisere til Tomboy-Online, din egen Rainy/Snowy server eller anden server, der understøtter Tomboy Web REST API. \n
For at bruge den, skal du indstille synkroniseringsmetode til Online Synkronisering i præferencerne og derefter indtaste en Server URL. Her er nogle af de offentlige muligheder:
-Tomboy Online - https://edge.tomboy-online.org/
-rainy.notesync.org - https://notesync.org:8080/[username]/[password]/\n
Når de er indstillet, klik på Sync logoet i Tomdroid\'s top bar for at synkronisere dine noter.\n
Bemærk: Du kunne måske ønske at sikkerhedskopiere dine Tomboy noter inden synkronisering, da denne app stadig er under udvikling, og kan beskadige dine Tomboy noter.\n
Se venligst http://live.gnome.org/Tomboy/Directories for placeringen af *.note filerne for alle platforme.\n
=SD kort=
Kom dine Tomboy noter (*.note) på dit SD kort under tomdroid/. Når noterne er kopierede, sæt da Sync Service til SD kort under indstilliger. Tryk derefter på Synkroniser logoet i Tomdroids top bar.\n
Tomdroid søger altid nye biddragsydere. Hvis du er interesseret, tilslut dig da tomdroids udviklingsteam på Launchpad: http://launchpad.net/~tomdroid-dev.\n
Endeligt, hvis du oplever problemer, være venlig at rapportere dem her: https://bugs.launchpad.net/tomdroid

file.string:
En Tomboy klient til Android. Tomboy er en note applikation til din computer som benytter wikiwiki funktionalitet og et simpelt bruger interface.

* Kompatibel med Tomboy note formatet
* Online Synkronisering med Rainy, Snowy eller Tomboy Online
* SD kort importering
* Hjemmeskærm genveje
* Send og modtag tekst eller note filer fra enhver app
* Open Source!

En note med den titel eksisterer allerede i databasen. Vælg venligst en handling til at løse konflikten. Du kan redigere en af noterne før valg, eller vise forskellen ved at klikke på mærkaterne nedenfor.
Det lykkedes at sikkerhedskopiere alle noter til SD kortet
Det lykkedes at hente note fra %1$s
Vælg hvilken synkroniseringsmetode, der skal bruges
Der er ingen noter i Tomdroids database
Fejl ved sendning af note til %1$s
Gemmer automatisk noter på denne enhed
Det lykkedes at slettet note fra %1$s
Der skete en fejl ved fortolkningen af noten. Kontroller venligst din XML-struktur
Slet alle noter fra fjernadgangen på serveren
Rediger mærker herunder, adskilt med kommaer
Er du sikker på, at du vil overskrive alle dine lokale noter, med den version som findes via fjernadgangen på serveren?

\"%1$s\" er ikke en gyldig mappe. Forsøg venligst igen!
Mappen \"%1$s\" eksisterer ikke endnu. Forbind venligst din enhed til computeren, opret en mappe og læg dine *.note filer i den.
Hvis valgt, vil skabeloner for note blive vist i noteslisten.
Det lykkedes at slette noter fra %1$s.
Vælg en fil nedenfor der er enten en Tomboy note fil (som vil blive importeret) eller en almindelig tekstfil (som vil oprette en ny note):

Synkroniser dine noter ved opstart af applikationen
Forbindelsen til serveren mislykkedes. Tjek venligst, at du har indtastet den rigtige adresse.

Velkommen til Tomdroid.

Bemærk venligst at dette er beta software i testfasen og, at det indeholder kendte problemer.

Vi er alle bekendte med disse problemer og søger at løse dem så hurtigt som muligt. Men jeg ville gerne have en version ud og få testet hos jer så hurtigt som muligt.

Du skal være mere end velkommen til at bidrage til projektet på alle niveauer. Kig ind på launchpad.net/tomdroid og kontakt os!
Launchpad Contributions: David Nielsen https://launchpad.net/~davidnielsen Mads Boserup Lauritsen https://launchpad.net/~madsbola Mads Dyrmann Larsen https://launchpad.net/~madsdyrmannlarsen
